articles.title: Trump Announces 35% Tariff on Canadian Imports
articles.description: President Donald Trump has announced a 35% tariff on Canadian imports, effective August 1, citing Canada's alleged failure to stop fentanyl from entering the U.S. and warning of potential further increases if Canada retaliates.

articles.title: European NATO Members Project Naval Power Near China
articles.description: European NATO members, including the UK, France, and Italy, have deployed aircraft carriers to the Indo-Pacific region to counter China's military buildup, aiming to assist the U.S. in maintaining regional stability.

articles.title: Bitcoin Surpasses $118,000 Amid Record ETF Inflows
articles.description: Bitcoin has reached a new all-time high, surpassing $118,000, following the largest day of inflows into bitcoin exchange-traded funds this year, totaling $1.18 billion.
